com.mapzen.tangram

Interface TouchInput.RotateResponder

  • Enclosing class:
    TouchInput

    public static interface TouchInput.RotateResponder
    Interface for responding to a rotation gesture

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onRotate(float x, float y, float rotation)
      Called repeatedly while two touch points are rotated around a point

    • Method Detail

      • onRotate

        boolean onRotate(float x,
               float y,
               float rotation)
        Called repeatedly while two touch points are rotated around a point
        Parameters:
        x - The x screen coordinate of the center of rotation
        y - The y screen coordinate of the center of rotation
        rotation - The change in rotation of the touch points relative to the previous rotation event, in counter-clockwise radians
        Returns:
        True if the event is consumed, false if the event should continue to propagate
